question: Nowadays there is an increasing trend of big shopping centres opening up while small shops are closing down. What are the advantages and disadvantages of big shopping centres versus small local shops?
text: It  is widely observed that current consumers  tend to visit huge Malls for their buys instead of local stores. As a consequence, the local market is facing a financial crisis and the corresponding stores cannot stand out.  The aforementioned issue is controversial and both positive and negative aspects will be discussed in this essay.

On the one hand, it could be argued that there  are many benefits for consumers in finding easily a variety of products at special prices inside the giant marketplaces. Indeed, a Mall consists of several different stores providing a plethora of products of previous seasons at affordable prices  to gain not only consumers' attention but also to be more competitive . More particular, stores inside the enormous centres handle the stock items all over the year  since they can immediately access their logistics chain. Therefore, buyers can achieve discounts and beneficial deals. For example, the stores in Metro mall in Athens  offer every second Saturday a discount of 15% for any return customer.

On the other hand, the abandonment of local stores is strongly related to the increase in unemployment rates. To be more precise, in a regional shop apart from the payment of employees is occurred transactions via a number of professionals of  the neighbourhood,like local accountants, technicians e.t.c.  That is to ,say since a store in a neighbourhood is forced to close, there is a domino effect on the whole local economy. This can be clearly illustrated by the projections of recent business research forecasting that after the opening of the upcoming "shops in a shop" concept mall in the Athenian north suburbs  would  be fired around 650 employees of the local businesses due to low demand.

In conclusion,although the system of the free market  and the multinational companies will expand the erection of the shopping malls in the near future, I insist on the superiority to protect the local business, since it is a crucial factor in the domestic economy. Therefore, the state and the ministry of finance should state a business law system offering extra benefits for the opening of a local store.
